name: My Prince II: The Frozen Curse
name_original: My Prince II: The Frozen Curse
description:
In this second part of My Prince, princess Emilia continues to look for prince Leonard, who was previously disappeared with the evil witch Lilraya.

Princess Emilia arrived at the witch’s garden, which is the house of different plant-type monsters. She needs to find the way to the witch and defeat her in order to save the prince from the frozen curse.
